Package socialmedia

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform
    MiniSocialMediaPlatform interface.
    SocialMediaPlatform
    SocialMediaPlatform interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Account class creates a social media account with a unique ID and saves it to the system
    Comment
    Comment class creates a comment object
    Endorsement
    Endorsement class to create an Endorsement object
    GenericEmptyPost
    Generic Empty Post class creates a placeholder post
    Post
    Post class creates a social media post
    SocialMedia
    SocialMedia is an implemetor of the SocialMediaPlatform interface
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccountIDNotRecognisedException
    Exception: if the Account ID is not in the system
    HandleNotRecognisedException
    Exception: if the handle is not in the system
    IllegalHandleException
    Exception: If the new handle already exists in the platform.
    InvalidHandleException
    Exception: if the handle is empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
    InvalidPostException
    Exception: if the Post message is empty, has more than 100 characters.
    NotActionablePostException
    Exception: if trying to endorse or comment on an endorsement post
    PostIDNotRecognisedException
    Exception: if the Post ID is not on the system.
